abstract: PepsiCo has reached a deal to buy the outstanding shares of its two main bottlers, ending a months-long standoff over price.
snippet: PepsiCo has reached a deal to buy the outstanding shares of its two main bottlers, ending a months-long standoff over price.

headline.main: Pepsi Reaches $7.8 Billion Deal for 2 Bottlers

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
